title: Mini-Ep 208: Your Soul Is Smiling
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 208: Your Soul Is Smiling
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree barrel through a busy time and lament valuing productivity over everything. Then, they hear from listeners about self-care with a chronic illness, humidity help, and a foundation tip that stumps them both. Plus, a listener calls in about...
description:
Kate and Doree barrel through a busy time and lament valuing productivity over everything. Then, they hear from listeners about self-care with a chronic illness, humidity help, and a foundation tip that stumps them both. Plus, a listener calls in about a doozy of a date. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Join us on June 7 for a live virtual happy hour! To attend, pre-order Doree's book Thanks for Waiting and register at doree-shafrir.com/pre-order.
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter


This episode is sponsored by:

AERA - Go to aeraforhome.com for 25% off diffusers and free shipping with the code FOREVER35.

WONDERCIDE - Try Wondercide Flea & Tick Spray today at wondercide.com/forever35 and get 20% off.

ROTHY’S - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.
